mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_CODE , CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_NO , USE_FLAG FROM TB_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO ASC

SELECT
SECTION_CODE
BUILDING_CODE
, ( SELECT CATEGORY_CODE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE 1=1
AND CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}
ORDER BY EVENT_START_TIME LIMIT 1 ) AS CATEGORY_CODE , EVENT_TYPE_CODE FROM TB_EVENT WHERE DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE()
AND CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}
AND EVENT_TYPE_CODE = #{eventTypeCode}
AND DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i') > DATE_fORMAT(#{timeSearch}, '%H:%i')
GROUP BY SECTION_CODE
GROUP BY BUILDING_CODE

SELECT A.EVENT_CODE , A.EVENT_NAME , CATEGORY_CODE , A.PLACE_CODE , ( SELECT PLACE_NAME FROM TB_PLACE P WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = P.SECTION_CODE AND A.BUILDING_CODE = P.BUILDING_CODE AND A.PLACE_CODE = P.PLACE_CODE ) AS PLACE_NAME , A.EVENT_TYPE_CODE , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_START_TIME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_END_TIME , CONCAT(DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i'), '~', DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i')) AS EVENT_TIME , ( SELECT COUNT(USER_CODE) AS TOT_USER_CNT FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE GROUP BY G.EVENT_CODE ) AS TOT_PRSNNL , IFNULL(( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(USER_CODE), 0) FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE AND G.LIKE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY A.EVENT_CODE ),0) AS TOT_LIKE , MINIMUM_PRSNNL , MAXIMUM_PRSNNL , DETAIL_INFO FROM TB_EVENT A WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = #{sectionCode} AND (A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001' OR A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001') AND EVENT_TYPE_CODE = 'EVT001'

SELECT EVENT_CODE , EVENT_NAME , SECTION_CODE , BUILDING_CODE , CASE WHEN PLACE_CODE = 'PLCE000170' THEN '차츰 (영통구 청명북로7번길 13)' WHEN PLACE_CODE = 'PLCE000179' THEN '나니아루프탑 파티룸 (영통구 반달로 32-1 5층)' WHEN PLACE_CODE = 'PLCE000144' THEN '나니아라운지 파티룸\n(영통구 반달로35번길 19 지하1층 101호)' WHEN PLACE_CODE = 'PLCE000013' THEN '****도예공방 라온제나*****\n(영통구 청명남로 54 이호빌딩 지하1층)' WHEN PLACE_CODE = 'PLCE000036' THEN '외국어대학 달콤커피' ELSE '' END AS PLACE_NAME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d") AS EVENT_DATE , CONCAT(DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i'), '~', DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i')) AS EVENT_TIME , MINIMUM_PRSNNL AS TOT_PRSNNL , UNIZONE_HOST_NAME , UNIZONE_FEE , CONVERT(DETAIL_INFO USING utf8) AS DETAIL_INFO , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP B WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = B.EVENT_CODE AND B.USER_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTUSRST003' ) AS REAL_PRSNNL -- 실참가자 , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_START_TIME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_END_TIME FROM TB_EVENT A WHERE (EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001' OR EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS002') AND EVENT_TYPE_CODE = 'EVT002'

SELECT A.EVENT_CODE , A.EVENT_NAME , CATEGORY_CODE , A.PLACE_CODE , ( SELECT PLACE_NAME FROM TB_PLACE P WHERE A.SECTION_CODE = P.SECTION_CODE AND A.BUILDING_CODE = P.BUILDING_CODE AND A.PLACE_CODE = P.PLACE_CODE ) AS PLACE_NAME , A.EVENT_TYPE_CODE , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_START_TIME , DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i') AS EVENT_END_TIME , CONCAT(DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, '%H:%i'), '~', DATE_fORMAT(EVENT_END_TIME, '%H:%i')) AS EVENT_TIME , ( SELECT COUNT(USER_CODE) AS TOT_USER_CNT FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE GROUP BY A.EVENT_CODE ) AS TOT_PRSNNL , IFNULL(( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(USER_CODE), 0) FROM TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP G WHERE A.EVENT_CODE = G.EVENT_CODE AND G.LIKE_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY A.EVENT_CODE ),0) AS TOT_LIKE , A.MINIMUM_PRSNNL , A.MAXIMUM_PRSNNL , A.DETAIL_INFO FROM TB_EVENT A INNER JOIN TB_EVENT_USER_MAPP_GROUP B ON A.EVENT_CODE = B.EVENT_CODE WHERE B.USER_CODE = #{userCode} AND (A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS001' OR A.EVENT_STATUS_CODE = 'EVTSTS002') AND DATE_FORMAT(EVENT_START_TIME, "%Y-%m-%d") >= CURDATE() AND B.LIKE_FLAG = 'Y'
